title: Enjoy opulent audio with AirPods Max for $70 off at Amazon
content:
Whether you’re listening to Spatial Audio tracks on Apple Music or just want the to get ready for a top-notch movie experience on the Apple TV in iOS 15, the AirPods Max are the best way to get it. And today you can get the ultimate listening experience for the best price we’ve ever seen: Amazon is selling a pair of AirPods Max headphones in Space Gray for $478, the lowest price we’ve ever seen.

Granted, the AirPods Max still costs a lot more than other Bluetooth headphones, but if you don’t mind spending top dollar on a pair of noise-canceling wireless headphones, your ears will thank you. In our 4-star review, we called the AirPods Max “opulent” with “sound quality on par or even slightly better than their competitors, and superior noise-canceling.”

Yes, they’re expensive, but if you’re an Apple Music subscriber or an Apple TV fan who doesn’t mind spending a little extra to get the best, go grab a pair right now. Your ears will thank you
